developer_warning: Warning This is a developer page and has not been through user research

header.feedback: This is a new service – your feedback will help us to improve it.

error.generic: You could not be logged in. Please try again later.
error.expired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.

homepage.title: Welcome to the StatsWales Beta
homepage.welcome: This is a test page for development from here you can do the following:
homepage.dataset_creation: Start a new dataset creation journey

start.title: Create a new dataset
start.p1: To create a new dataset, you'll need:
start.data_table: a data table containing data and references to all relevant dimensions
start.lookup_table: lookup tables for all relevant dimensions - using either common tables within this service or uploading them yourself
start.metadata: details about the dataset including description, quality and how the data was collected

title.heading: What is the title of the dataset?
title.appear: This title will appear on the StatsWales website
title.descriptive: It should be short, descriptive and unique
title.language: This should be entered in the language in which you're viewing this service.

summary.heading: What is the summary of the dataset?
summary.explain_1: what this dataset is about and what it shows
summary.explain_2: the dataset's dimensions and why they've been used, if needed
summary.language: This should be entered in the language in which you're viewing this service.

collection.heading: How was the data collected or calculated?
collection.explain: In short, simple sentences explain either:
collection.explain_1: the methodology used to collect the data
collection.explain_2: the methodology used to calculate the data
collection.language: This should be entered in the language in which you're viewing this service.

quality.heading: What is the statistical quality of this dataset?
quality.explain_1: any issues or methodological changes related to the dataset including any:
quality.explain_1a: notes relevant to all data values in the dataset
quality.explain_1b: custom explanations needed to clarify any note codes used
quality.explain_2: a high-level summary of the statistical quality report, if available
quality.language: This should be entered in the language in which you're viewing this service.

rounding.heading: Has rounding been applied to the data values?

yes.label: Yes
yes.note: In short, simple sentences explain what rounding has been applied.

update_frequency.heading: Will this dataset be regularly updated?

period.label: Enter the period between updates. For example, 1 year.

add.heading: Add a link to a report

add_another.heading: Do you need to add a link to another report?

link_label.label: Link text to appear on the webpage
link_label.hint: This should be entered in the language in which you're viewing this service.

add_another.heading: Do you need to add another source?

providers.explain: If you cannot find the data provider in the list, you can request a data provider be added.

provider.hint: Start typing or select from the list.

upload.title: Upload the data table
upload.note: The file should be in a CSV format

preview.heading: Check the data table
preview.upload_summary: There are {{cols}} columns and {{rows}} rows in the data table. {{ignored}} column(s) in the CSV upload have been ignored.
preview.confirm_correct: By continuing, you confirm the data table is correct.

sources.heading: What does each column in the data table contain?

metadata.title: Title
metadata.update_frequency: How often the dataset is updated

publishing.when: When the dataset should be published

change_data.title: What do you need to do?
change_data.note: The file should be in a CSV format

change_table.label: Upload a different data table
change_table.description: This will remove reference data and notes from all dimensions

change_columns.label: Change what each column in the data table contains
change_columns.description: This will remove reference data and notes for any columns you change that contain dimensions

confirm.missing: You need to confirm or reject the uploaded file using the buttons at the end of the preview

session.current_dataset_missing: Current data set is missing from the session
session.current_revision_missing: Current revision is missing from the session
session.current_import_missing: Current import is missing from the session
session.no_sources_on_import: Current import has no sources present on it, was the CSV empty?

sources.unknowns_found: You need to tell us what each column contains
sources.multiple_datavalues: You can only specify one column as containing data values
sources.multiple_footnotes: You can only specify one column as containing notes
sources.dimension_creation_failed: Something went wrong trying to create the dimensions.  Please try again.

list.no_datasets: No datasets are currently listed in the database.  If you need help please reach out to a member of the development team.

display.no_dimensions: This dataset has not been completed with dimensions
display.no_revisions: This dataset has not been completed with revisions

preview.failed_to_get_preview: We were unable to generate a preview of the uploaded CSV.  Is this a valid CSV?
preview.remove_error: We were unable to remove your uploadded file from the server.  Something went wrong.  Please try again
preview.confirm_error: You need to confirm or reject the uploaded file using the buttons at the end of the preview
preview.revision_missing: A revision is missing from the dataset
preview.import_missing: An import is missing from the dataset

errors.blob_storage_errror: Unable to connect to Blob Storage Service
errors.dataset_missing: No dataset found with this ID

title.missing: Either a title was not entered or there is a problem.

description.missing: You need to provide a summary of the dataset

collection.missing: Either a collection method was not entered or there is a problem.

quality.missing: You need to provide the statistical quality of the dataset

rounding_applied.missing: You need to provide whether rounding has been applied to the data values

rounding_description.missing: You need to provide a description of the rounding applied

update_frequency.missing: You need to provide the update frequency of the dataset

related_link.required: You need to provide the link URL and text
related_link.missing: The related link could not be found

designation.missing: You need to provide the designation of the dataset

errors.server_error: An unknown error occcured, please try again later
